Step 4

Campaign Tracking

Create Campaign
Connect Website Activity Using Pixel
Choose how you want to install the pixel code
  • Add code using a Partner IntegrationFollow guided installation instructions with detailed developer documentation
  • Manually add pixel code to websiteIf you don’t have direct access to your side’s code, send instruction and documentatiuon to your technical support.

1. Instal base code on website

Copy and paste the pixel code into th ebottom of the header section of your site, just above the tag. Install the base code on every page of your website.

<script type='text/javascript'>(function(){var pf=document.createElement('script');pf.src='https://www.publicfast.com/assets/cpa/publicfast.js';pf.type='text/javascript';pf.async ='true';pf.onload=pf.onreadystatechange=function(){var rs=this.readyState;if(rs&&rs!='complete'&&rs!='loaded')return;try{window.__pf = new Publicfast({domain: 'https://www.publicfast.com'});}catch(e){}};var s=document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];s.parentNode.insertBefore(pf,s);})();</script>

Copy and paste the pixel code to the page where you want to track goals

<script type='text/javascript'>(function(){var pf=document.createElement('script');pf.src='https://www.publicfast.com/assets/cpa/publicfast.js';pf.type='text/javascript';pf.async ='true';pf.onload=pf.onreadystatechange=function(){var rs=this.readyState;if(rs&&rs!='complete'&&rs!='loaded')return;try{window.__pf = new Publicfast({domain: 'https://www.publicfast.com'});}catch(e){}};var s=document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];s.parentNode.insertBefore(pf,s);})();</script>

2. Test the base code

Make sure your pixel code was added correcty by sending test traffic to your site. If the status is shown as Active , your code has been installed correctly. This process may take several minutes.

1. 1. Enter email of the technical support

2. Test the base code

Make sure your pixel code was added correcty by sending test traffic to your site. If the status is shown as Active , your code has been installed correctly. This process may take several minutes.
Your campaign was created

Great your campaing is created, our team will chek in a moment and invite influencers to your campaing.
